name: Recycle This!
description:
Prevent (or delay) the Climate Crisis by going back in time!  Controls
  • Left Click : Drag items, make selections
  • Space : Use e-brake (when purchased)
  • F : Fullscreen
  • M : Mute/Unmute Music
  • S : Mute/Unmute Sound effects
